reviews.review_msg: The workload was demanding for a 300 level course but if you put in the work, there is no reason why you should not do well. Professor Harriss is a fair marker, the expectations are clear, and he takes the time to help you if you need it. He is excellent at communicating material and also very accommodating toward his students. Highly recommend!

I like his lectures, not the seminars because he leaves no room for discussion or comments from students but keeps on talking himself. An extremely tough marker. What will easily get you an A on other courses will only qualify for a B and if you put in a LOT then maybe A-
